WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing until more information can be provided to help us track down the root cause.
WorkItem.Description:
I'm migrating a large codebase (~90 files & 20k lines) from JavaScript to TypeScript.

When I try to compile the project, the compiler tsc 1.0.1 crashes.
It displays the following stack trace:

Comments.Message:
I've just tried to compile my project with tsc 1.0.0 to see if it crashed too.
The compilation didn't crash with tsc 1.0.0.

So, this is a regression in tsc 1.0.1.
Are you able to share the project with us (privately if necessary)? We can't really narrow down the issue with just a callstack unfortunately.
